thread.title_full: Socceroos straight down to work in Honduras | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: Socceroos straight down to work in Honduras | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Socceroos straight down to work in Honduras 7th Nov 2017 11:04 AM by Marco Montverde in San Pedro Sula Trent Sainsbury has no complaints about his treatment in Honduras. 
THE Socceroos were made to feel welcome in Honduras as 16 members of the travelling squad took part in Australia's first training session ahead of Saturday's World Cup qualifying playoff. 
Training at Estadio Francisco Morazán, the home ground of club Real España, the Socceroos completed a light session under the watchful eyes of coach Ange Postecoglou. 
The 16 players who trained were skipper Mile Jedinak, Aziz Behich, Danny Vukovic, Trent Sainsbury, Josh Risdon, Jackson Irvine, Bailey Wright, Aaron Mooy, Craig Goodwin, Massimo Luongo, Ryan McGowan, Milos Degenek, Jimmy Jeggo, Mat Ryan, Tom Rogic and James Troisi. 
The members of the 22-man travelling squad - some of who were yet to arrive in San Pedro Sula - were Tim Cahill, Mitch Langerak, Matt Jurman, Tomi Juric, Alex Gersbach and Nikita Rukavytsya. 
Earlier, China-based defender Sainbsury said the Socceroos were being treated well as they arrived from all over the world ahead of the start two-legged playoff. 
"Straight through from the airport, everyone's been really friendly," China-based Sainsbury said. 
"It's been great. I haven't had a bad thing to say about the place to be honest. 
"People keep hyping up that this is a really dangerous place to come, (that) it's going to be really hostile, (but) I don't see it that way at the moment. 
"Everyone's been really nice to us here. It's been a nice place and nice weather, so I've been happy the way it's gone so far, so I think we'll be looking good (on Saturday)." 
Sainsbury's comments came soon after National Autonomous Federation of Football of Honduras president Jorge Salomon had slammed "negative opinions" from Australia about violence and hostility in the Central American nation. 
"Too bad that in Australia they are expressing themselves in that way … because we are a humble country," the www.diariomas.hn website reported Salomon as saying. 
"I think the Australians are going to realise that they're going to arrive in a beautiful city of San Pedro Sula, a beautiful country that is Honduras. 
"They are going to (be) surprised of the good treatment they are going to (receive). We will treat them well." 
Socceroos defender Trent Sainsbury said Australian players were being treated well as they arrived from all over the world ahead of the first match of the two-legged playoff. 
However, the Socceroos are certain to be faced with an intimidating atmosphere at what will be a packed Estadio Olimpico Metropolitano on Saturday. 
"We'll have all the information that we possibly need to be ready for this game," said Sainsbury, who added the Socceroos had learnt a lot from their successful two-legged playoff against Syria last month. 
"The first away leg, (was a) difficult game (in) difficult circumstances. It's like a boxing match - everyone's throwing a few jabs to see what everyone's coming up with. 
"It was a bit of a learning curve. In the second game (against Syria) we learnt from that really well. Defending we did really well … I didn't feel like we were going to lose that game that day." 
Sainsbury said the speculation surrounding national coach Ange Postecoglou's future was not affecting the team. 
"The boys are just focused on these two games (against Honduras) and that's the main priority for us, not who's going to be the coach in the future because no-one's ever going to be the coach for the entirety of your career," Sainsbury said. Related Items

posts.title: Hastane duvarları kitap açtı
posts.text:
Yorum Yap Yazdır Facebook 'ta Paylaş Hastane duvarları kitap açtı Diyarbakır Gazi Yaşargil Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi bünyesinde başlatılan “Oku Projesi” kapsamında hasta yakınları için hastane koridorlarında bulunan duvarlara 30 adet kitaplık yapıldı. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 12:01 
Diyarbakır Gazi Yaşargil Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi bünyesinde başlatılan “Oku Projesi” kapsamında hasta yakınları için hastane koridorlarında bulunan duvarlara 30 adet kitaplık yapıldı. 
Diyarbakır Gazi Yaşargil Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi bünyesinde “Oku Projesi” başlatıldı. Proje kapsamında hasta yakınlarının hastanede geçirdikleri bekleme süresini daha faydalı değerlendirmeleri için Kadın Doğum ve Çocuk Hastalıkları hastaneleri koridorlarına “Oku” şeklinde 30 ayrı kitaplık yapıldı. Türkçe ve Kürtçe kitapların yer aldığı kitaplıklar büyük beğeni toplarken, projenin kentteki bütün hastanelerde hayata geçirilmesi planlanıyor. 
“PROJE ÇOK SEVİLDİ” 
Kitaplıkları inceleyen hasta yakınlarından Mehmet Sarıdağ, projeyi beğendiklerini ifade etti. Sarıdağ, “İyi bir proje. İnsanlarken beklerken ne okumak istiyorsa okuyacak. Yeni bilgiler öğrenecek. İyi bir şey bu. Hastamızı bekliyoruz şimdi burada. Beklerken hem zaman geçiyor hem de bilgi sahibi oluyoruz” dedi. 
Hastalarının yoğun bakımda yattığını ifade eden hasta yakını Ali Şahin, projenin can sıkıntısı gidermek ve bilgilenmek için çok güzel olduğunu anlatarak, yaygınlaşmasını istediklerini kaydetti. 
“TÜM HASTANELERE YAYMAK İSTİYORUZ” 
Yaklaşık 15 ay önce Gazi Yaşargil Eğitim ve Araştırma ile Kadın Doğum ve Çocuk Hastalıkları hastanelerinin birleşmesinden sonra sağlığı biyo-psiko-sosyal tam bir iyilik hali olarak gördüklerinin vurgulayan Oku Projesi Koordinatörü ve Kadın Doğum ve Çocuk Hastalıkları Hastanesi Başhekim Yardımcısı Uzman Dr. Muhammet Asena ise, “Biyolojik yönden hemşire ve doktor arkadaşlarımız gerekli tıbbi hizmeti zaten vermektedir. Ama bu işin bir de psiko-sosyal ayağı var. Bu açıdan sosyal verimlilik projeleri kapsamında İl Müftülüğü ile birlikte yaklaşık bir ay önce başlatılan okuma seferberliğini ne şekilde başlatırız diye düşünürken hastanelerimizde şuanda Gazi Yaşargil Eğitim ve Araştırma ve ona bağlı Kadın Doğum ve Çocuk Klinikleri aynı zamanda bağlar Semt Polikliniğimizde okuma projesinin bir adımını atalım dedik. Bu üç birimimizde okuma projemizi başlattık. Özellikle hastanemizin yoğun olan kısımlarında okuma seferberliğini başlattık aynı zamanda daha önce servislerimizde kütüphane haline getirdiğimiz, çocuklarımızın rahatlıkla kitaplarını okuyabileceği bir projemiz daha vardı. Ama daha eğitimli okuma aşkıyla yanan bir Diyarbakır arzumuz hat safada ve bu da bir ilk adım olacak. Kısmet olursa bunu tüm Diyarbakır’daki hastanelerimize yaymak isteriz” diye konuştu. 
“KİTAPLIKLAR ‘OKU’ ŞEKLİNDE DİZAYN EDİLDİ” 
Kitaplıkları “Oku” şeklinde dizayn ettiklerini ifade eden Asena, sözlerini şöyle sürdürdü: 
“Benim aklıma geldi ilk emir ‘ikra’dan gelen okudan gelen bir kitaplık şeklinde tasarlanabilir mi diye daha sonra bu işin teknik boyutunu arkadaşlarla konuştuk. Onlar da olabileceğini söylediler. Şuan beklediğimizden çok daha mutluyuz. Çünkü hem kitaplığımız hem de kitaplarımız halkımız tarafından rağbet görüyor. Uzun süre beklediklerinde farklı şeylerle uğraşıyorlardı burada en az bir iki saat bekledikleri zaman en azından okuyabilecekleri hem dini hem de sağlık açısından kitaplar var. Sadece Türkçe değil aynı zamanda Kürtçe kaynaklarımız da var. Şuanda ağırlıklı olarak Diyanet Yayınları mevcut. Bundan sonra diğer sivil toplum örgütleriyle de iletişim haline geçerek kitap daracığımızı daha fazla hale getireceğiz.” (Ejder Ediz Işık - Emrah Kızıl / İHA) İlgili Galeriler

posts.author: www.4-traders.com
posts.title: Porsche : generates group profit of 2.20 billion euro in the first nine months | 4-Traders
posts.text:
Stuttgart, 7 November 2017. Porsche Automobil Holding SE ('Porsche SE'), Stuttgart, generated a group profit of 2.20 billion euro for the period from 1 January to 30 September 2017 (prior-year period: 1.64 billion euro). This corresponds to an increase of 34 percent. Porsche SE's group profit for the period was significantly influenced by the profit from the investment accounted for at equity in Volkswagen AG, Wolfsburg, of 2.26 billion euro (prior-year period: 1.69 billion euro). 
Net liquidity of the Porsche SE Group totaled 961 million euro as of 30 September 2017. As of 31 December 2016, net liquidity had amounted to 1.30 billion euro. This decrease is primarily attributable to the acquisition of PTV AG at the beginning of September. 
The equity of the Porsche SE Group increased to 30.44 billion euro (31 December 2016: 27.89 billion euro). 
Based on the current group structure, in particular on the basis of the Volkswagen Group's expectations regarding its future development and the uncertainty surrounding possible special items in connection with the diesel issue, Porsche SE still expects a group profit of between 2.1 billion euro and 3.1 billion euro for the fiscal year 2017. Moreover, Porsche SE still aims to achieve positive net liquidity in the region of 0.7 billion euro to 1.2 billion euro as of 31 December 2017, not taking future investments into account. 
The group quarterly statement as of the third quarter of 2017 of Porsche Automobil Holding SE can be found at: www.porsche-se.com/en/investor-relations/financial-publications/ 
Porsche Automobil Holding SE published this content on 07 November 2017 and is solely responsible for the information contained herein.

thread.title: Charles and Camilla honoured with gifts on visit to Hindu temple
thread.title_full: Charles and Camilla honoured with gifts on visit to Hindu temple

posts.author: PA
posts.title: Charles and Camilla honoured with gifts on visit to Hindu temple
posts.text:
Charles and Camilla honoured with gifts on visit to Hindu temple By PA 7 Nov 2017, 9:16 - 
The Prince of Wales and Duchess of Cornwall have experienced four religions in one day - and were honoured with luxurious silk shawls and garlands of sandalwood. 
Charles and Camilla visited places of worship belonging to the Christian, Muslim, Chinese and Hindu communities in the Penang capital George Town as they celebrated the Malaysian city's diverse residents. Further along the Street of Harmony, TRH arrive at Han Jiang Temple and are welcomed by a Chinese lion dance. #RoyalVisitMY pic.twitter.com/LHW9y9wcR1 
-- Clarence House (@ClarenceHouse) November 7, 2017 
Strolling down what is colloquially known as the Street of Harmony, the royal couple walked from a mosque to the temples as backpackers and shop keepers stopped to capture the unannounced visit on their smartphones. (Yui Mok/PA) 
Drummers and other musicians led the way as they walked to the Sri Mahamariamman Hindu temple, completed in 1833, that was ornately decorated with colourful statues that were mirrored by beautiful carvings of gods inside. (Yui Mok/PA) 
Following tradition, Charles and Camilla removed their shoes and were given a brief tour of the place of worship before shimmering gold-coloured shawls were placed around their shoulders and matching garlands draped around their necks. (Yui Mok/PA) 
Preveena Balakrishnan, a local historian and Hindu, said: "We wanted to have a fragrant garland so we chose sandalwood - flower garlands will fade and die. Built in 1801, Kapitan Keling Mosque is the oldest mosque in George Town. TRH learn about its history and architecture. #RoyalVisitMY pic.twitter.com/Nza2haLrAq 
-- Clarence House (@ClarenceHouse) November 7, 2017 
"The silk shawls are given to kings and queens and we believe silk has the power to attract positive vibes." TRH visit St George's Church in Penang, which has been declared as one of the 50 National Treasures of Malaysia. #RoyalVisitMY pic.twitter.com/Em4GypOqIz

thread.title_full: Pobjede Seltiksa, Voriorsa, i Netsa

posts.title: Pobjede Seltiksa, Voriorsa, i Netsa
posts.text: NBA LIGA 07. 11. 2017. 09:05 >> 08:33 0 Pobjede Seltiksa, Voriorsa, i Netsa Boston Seltiksi, Golden Stejt Voriorsi i Bruklin Netsi ostvarili su pobjede u NBA ligi protekle noći. Tweet U meču večeri Seltiksi su u finišu "slomili" Atlanta Hokse 110:107 za devetu uzastopnu pobjedu nakon dva poraza na otvaranju sezone. Seltikse je predvodio Kajri Irving sa 35 poena, u meču u kojem su se dva tima 25 puta smjenjivala u vođstvu, prelomivši duel trojkom na minut i po prije kraja. Imao je i sedam asistencija, a pratili su ga Džejson Tejtum sa 21 poenom i osam skokova, te Al Horford kojem je nedostajala asistencija za tripl-dabl (15 poena, deset skokova). Kod Hoksa je najefikasniji bio Denis Šruder sa 23 poena i šest asistencija, a po 19 su ubacili Marko Belineli i Devejn Dedmon koji je imao i 12 skokova. Voriori prvi put u sezoni nijesu postigli trocifren broj poena, ali su ubjedljivo savladali Majami Hit 97:80. Iako su se mučili sa šutom, pogodili tek 37% pokušaja za dva poena, Voriorsi su zahvaljujući 11 trojki razbili Hit za osmi trijumf u sezoni. Kevin Durent prevodio je "ratnike" sa 21 poenom, osam skokova i šest asistencija, Drejmond Grin je ubacio 18 poena uz devet uhvaćenih lopti, dok je Stef Kari dodao 16 (5/19 iz igre). U ekipi Hita najefikasniji je bio rezervista Džejms Džonson sa 21 poenom, devet skokova, šest asistencija i tri ukradene lopte uz blokadu, dok je 19 dodao Goran Dragić. Netsi su nadigrali Finiks Sanse 98:92 u Arizoni, a predvodio ih je Dianđelo Rasel sa 23 poena, osam asistencija i šest skokova, a odličan je bo i Džo Heris sa 18 poena. U četvrtom trijumfu Netsa u sezoni dvocifren učinak imali su još Alen Kreb sa 15 poena, Demari Kerol sa 14 uz 11 skokova, te Tajler Zeler sa 12. U redovima Sansa je najbolji bio Ti Džej Voren sa 20 poena i devet skokova, 18 je dodao Devon Buker, 16 je ubacio Majk Džejms, dok je 11 postigao Tajler Julis.

posts.title: Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma
posts.text: SONDAKİKA MANŞETLER SÜRMANŞETLER GALERİLER WEB TV NELER OLUYOR? İLETİŞİM YAZARLAR KÜNYE WEBMASTER Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma Salihli Belediye Başkanı Zeki Kayda, Manisa Büyükşehir Belediyesi tarafından Avar Caddesi’nde gerçekleştirilen prestij cadde düzenleme çalışmalarını yerinde inceledi. Anasayfa Gündem Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma  25:40 Site 0 Tweetle 0 Salihli Belediye Başkanı Zeki Kayda, Manisa Büyükşehir Belediyesi tarafından Avar Caddesi’nde gerçekleştirilen prestij cadde düzenleme çalışmalarını yerinde inceledi.Avar Caddesi’ni baştan aşağı değiştirerek prestij kazandıracak olan çalışmaları Başkan Yardımcısı İbrahim Karaca ile birlikte inceleyen Başkan Kayda, hızla devam eden çalışmalarla ilgili olarak yüklenici firma yetkililerinden bilgi aldı. Bisiklet yolu, cep otoparkları, yenilenen kaldırımları ve yolu ile Avar Caddesi’nin modern bir görünüme kavuşacağını belirten Başkan Kayda, Salihli’ye değer katan projeleri kazandıran Manisa Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Cengiz Ergün’e teşekkür etti. Prestij cadde düzenleme çalışmalarının kısa sürede tamamlanacağını ifade eden Başkan Kayda, “Yola çıktığımız günden bugüne Salihli’yi değiştirmek için verdiğimiz sözleri bir bir hayata geçirdiğimizi görüyor. Yağmur suyu çalışmaları ardından yol düzenleme çalışmaları hızlı bir şekilde devam ediyor. Avar Caddesi’nde maksimum 1 aylık bir işimiz kaldı. Altyapısı, bisiklet yoluyla, aydınlatmasıyla çok güzel bir cadde olacak. Salihlimize hayırlı olsun“ dedi.Kaynak:

thread.title: Bu testi neden yaptırdı?
thread.title_full: Bu testi neden yaptırdı?

posts.author: yenisafak.com
posts.title: Bu testi neden yaptırdı?
posts.text:
Ankara Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı, 19 Aralık 2016’da Çağdaş Sanatlar Merkezi’nde katıldığı bir sergi sırasında suikast sonucu öldürülen Karlov’un katiline ilişkin soruşturmayı çok yönlü olarak sürdürüyor. Suikast tarihinden başlayarak geriye doğru katil Mevlüt Mert Altıntaş’ın nerelere gittiğini, kimlerle irtibat kurduğunu ve bağlantılarını araştıran savcılık, faille ilgili önemli bir ayrıntıya ulaştı.
KISIRLIK DERECESİNDE
Ankara Çevik Şube Müdürlüğü’ne 2014 Haziran’da tayini çıkan Altıntaş’ın göreve başladıktan yaklaşık 3 ay sonra Etlik Zübeyde Hanım Kadın Hastalıkları Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi’ne gittiği ve sperm sayısını ölçtürdüğü belirlendi. Hastane raporuna göre, Altıntaş’ın test sonuçlarının kısırlık değerinde olduğu anlaşıldı.
REKLAM Rapora göre, suikastçı 15 Eylül 2014 tarihinde hastaneye gitti. Soruşturma kapsamında savcılığın elde ettiği bulgulara göre de Altıntaş’ın bu tarihten sonra değişmeye başladı.
TEST MERCEK ALTINDA
Altıntaş’ın, Ankara’ya geldikten hemen sonra neden böyle bir test yaptırdığı mercek altına alınırken, suikast için seçilmesinde bunun etkisinin olup olmadığı da inceleniyor. Savcılık, tüm bunlarla ilgili araştırmasını sürdürüyor. 

thread.title: Staff shortages pose 'biggest risk' to quality of NHS care
thread.title_full: Staff shortages pose 'biggest risk' to quality of NHS care

posts.author: PA
posts.title: Staff shortages pose 'biggest risk' to quality of NHS care
posts.text:
Staff shortages pose 'biggest risk' to quality of NHS care By PA 7 Nov 2017, 7:16 - 
Patient safety and quality of care are at risk due to a workforce gap in the NHS, health leaders have said. 
Workforce concerns have become the "single biggest risk facing services", according to NHS Providers, a membership body, which represents health service organisations. 
The gap between the number of staff NHS bodies need and the number they are able to recruit and retain is now unsustainable, according to the latest report. #NHS relies now on the EU 'pipeline', so #Brexit uncertainty is having big impact on recruitment. @Saffron_Policy https://t.co/VrKPPlkYwX pic.twitter.com/gqviKTg1cB 
-- NHS Providers (@NHSProviders) November 6, 2017 
This is putting patients at risk and could undermine plans to transform the health service, it said. 
"The NHS... is struggling to cope with growing and changing pressures. We have now reached a tipping point: workforce concerns have become the single biggest risk facing services," the report states. 
"The gap between the workforce that providers need and the staff they are able to recruit and retain is now unsustainable, putting patient safety and quality of care at risk. It may also undermine much-needed schemes to transform and modernise services." 
The authors said that the workforce gap has almost certainly widened since Health Education England reported a staffing shortfall of 5.9% or 50,000 clinical staff in 2014. 
Staff shortages have already led to closures of some services and put extra pressure on existing staff, the report added. #NHSP17 is now just one day away. Join 600 #NHS leaders and high profile speakers - follow #NHSP17 for updates https://t.co/9MGY4HTqyE pic.twitter.com/xJsDpRxLn6 
-- NHS Providers (@NHSProviders) November 6, 2017 
The body, which is holding its annual meeting in Birmingham, also said that it is unclear whether tactics aimed at improving home-grown NHS staff will be enough to meet growing demand. 
A new poll of 149 chairmen and chief executives of NHS trusts and foundation trusts found that 66% believed workforce challenges were the most pressing issue facing their trust. 
When asked for the biggest challenges to recruitment and retention at their trust, 60% of trust chairmen and chief executives cited work pressure and 38% cited pay and reward. 
The survey also found that 85% said it would be important to recruit staff from outside the UK in the next three year. 
But uncertainty linked to Brexit was cited as a challenge in the recruitment of overseas health workers. . @Saffron_Policy warns that losing valuable #NHS staff is the last thing that the health service can afford: https://t.co/VrKPPl3n8n pic.twitter.com/DoxWvqNq2d 
-- NHS Providers (@NHSProviders) November 4, 2017 
Labour's shadow health secretary Jonathan Ashworth said: "This is a damning report cataloguing failures of ministers on workforce planning. As NHS Providers makes clear, the staffing crisis facing our NHS reflects a fundamental failure at national level on workforce strategy." 
A Department of Health spokeswoman said: "The NHS has over 12,700 more doctors and 10,600 more nurses on wards since May 2010 -- but we know that we need more staff. 
"That's why we recently announced the biggest ever expansion of training places for doctors and nurses, as well as being clear that the future of EU nationals is a top priority in the Brexit negotiations and we want their valued contribution to the NHS to continue -- to ensure the NHS has the staff it needs both now and in the future." thread.title: Jangan Sesekali Tekan 'Proceed' Kononnya LHDN Nak 'Refund Tax', Nanti Habis Duit Dalam Akaun Bank Kena Sedut
thread.title_full: Jangan Sesekali Tekan 'Proceed' Kononnya LHDN Nak 'Refund Tax', Nanti Habis Duit Dalam Akaun Bank Kena Sedut

posts.author: Admin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Jangan Sesekali Tekan 'Proceed' Kononnya LHDN Nak 'Refund Tax', Nanti Habis Duit Dalam Akaun Bank Kena Sedut
posts.text:
Sejak beberapa hari lalu tersebar di media sosial tentang kegiatan pihak tidak bertanggungjawab menghantar emel menggunakan nama dan logo Lembaga Hasil Dalam Negeri (LHDN) untuk menipu orang ramai. Ada individu mendakwa ada mangsa telah mengalami kerugi wang belasan ribu ringgit selepas menekan butang ''Proceed'' yang meminta mangsa mendedahkan nombor akaun mereka untuk dipulangkan cukai terlebih bayar kononnya daripada pihak LHDN.

Pihak LHDN dalam satu kenyataan menafikan mereka ada mengeluarkan sebarang emel seperti yang tersebar dan mengesahkan terdapat sindiket telah menggunakan nama dan logo agensi mereka untuk menipu orang ramai terutamanya pembayar cukai. LHDN dalam satu kenyataan media di laman web mereka menyatakan sindiket yang turut dikenali sebagai penyangak kewangan itu telah dikesan melakukan beberapa cubaan menipu dengan menghantar emel kepada orang ramai kononnya mereka mempunyai cukai terlebih bayar yang akan dibayar semula oleh pihak LHDN.
Mereka akan menerima emel, untuk menerima 'refund' berkenaan, pembayar cukai perlu menekan butang ''proceed' dan arahan akan diberikan agar mangsa mendedahkan butiran akaun bank bagi membolehkan transaksi bayaran balik lebihan cukai dibuat oleh LHDN.
"Harap maklum bahawa LHDN tidak pernah menghantar e-mel kepada pembayar cukai untuk meminta pembayar cukai mendedahkan nombor akaun bank mereka. Ini kerana maklumat akaun bank tersebut akan diperoleh melalui  perisytiharan oleh pembayar cukai ketika mereka mengisi Borang Nyata Cukai Pendapatan pada setiap tahun. 

"Selain itu, lebihan bayaran balik cukai pendapatan yang berjaya diproses berdasarkan maklumat yang betul juga akan dikreditkan terus oleh LHDN ke akaun bank pembayar cukai menerusi pembayaran secara Electronic Fund Transfer (EFT) atau menerusi Baucar Bayaran Balik Cukai (BBC) atau Cek Berpalang atau Telegraphic Transfer (untuk mereka yang mempunyai akaun di luar negara)," menurut kenyataan itu.
Selain itu, modus operandi mereka lakukan adalah  menghantar Surat Tuntutan Cukai Tertunggak yang palsu kepada orang ramai yang sememangnya akan dikeluarkan oleh LHDN sebagai surat peringatan kepada pembaayr cukai yang mempunyai tunggakan agak menjelaskannya.
"Sebelum arahan yang diterima melalui e-mel tersebut dituruti, orang ramai adalah dinasihatkan agar membuat semakan terlebih dahulu ketulenan e-mel berkenaan yang boleh dibuat melalui domain e-mel yang digunakan oleh pengirim e-mel yang tertera pada e-mel tersebut.  

"Setiap e-mel rasmi daripada LHDN akan menggunakan domain e-mel @hasil.gov.my. Orang ramai dilarang untuk mematuhi arahan dalam e-mel yang mengguna pakai domain selain daripada domain rasmi,'' jelas mereka.


Untuk mendapat pengesahan surat tunggakan cukai orang ramai boleh terus menghubungi talian Hasil Careline di 1-800-88-5436 atau Talian Hasil Recovery Call Centre di 1-800-88-4726 atau nombor talian Cawangan LHDN yang mengeluarkan surat tersebut (ada pada kepala surat). - Siakapkeli.my Sumber: LHDN

thread.title: Donald Lu: Në fillim të 2018-ës presim arrestimin e “peshqëve të mëdhenj”
thread.title_full: Donald Lu: Në fillim të 2018-ës presim arrestimin e “peshqëve të mëdhenj”

posts.author: Ornela Jaupi
posts.title: Donald Lu: Në fillim të 2018-ës presim arrestimin e “peshqëve të mëdhenj”
posts.text:
Ambasadori amerikan përshëndeti operacionin “Forca e Ligjit” e prezantuar nga Ministria e Brendshme dhe për herë të parë vendosi afate se kur pret rezultate nga ky operacion.
“Të flasim me vepra dhe jo me fjalë. Presim që ky plan agresiv i Qeverisë së Shqipërisë të përfundojë me arrestimin dhe ndjekjen penale të disa peshqve të mëdhenj në fillim të vitit të ardhshëm dhe ky sukses të vazhdojë me SPAK-un”, deklaroi ambasadori Donald Lu.
Kjo është ajo që presin partnerët ndërkombëtarë, tha Lu, e po ashtu edhe qytetarët shqiptarë. Lu vlerësoi planin.
“Dielli duket që në mëngjes. Na pëlqen që ky plan veprimi e pranon qartë se krimi i organizuar shqiptar është problem serioz dhe kërcënim për sigurinë kombëtare. Pranon gjithashtu se deri më tani organet e drejtësisë penale kanë dështuar ndaj grupeve kriminale”, vijoi ai.

posts.title: Bir efsane daha futbola veda etti
posts.text:
Bir efsane daha futbola veda etti İtalyan futbolunun efsane isimlerinden Andrea Pirlo, profesyonel kariyerini sonlandırdığını açıkladı. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:37 
İtalyan futbolunun efsane isimlerinden Andrea Pirlo, profesyonel kariyerini sonlandırdığını açıkladı. 
ABD Birinci Futbol Ligi’nde (MLS) New York City forması giyen Andrea Pirlo, 38 yaşında profesyonel kariyerini noktaladığını duyurdu. Columbus Crew ile 2-2 berabere tamamlanan maçın ardından sosyal medya hesabından açıklamalarda bulunan başarılı isim, "MLS’de son maçıma çıktım. Beni destekleyen herkese teşekkürler. Muhteşem taraftara, teknik heyete, sahne arkasındaki herkese ve takım arkadaşlarıma teşekkür ederim" dedi. Futbola veda ettiğini belirten Pirlo, ailesine ve kendisine destek olan tüm taraftarlara teşekkür ederek, "Her zaman kalbimde olacaksınız" ifadelerini kullandı. 
İtalya’da Juventus, Milan, Inter, Reggina, Brescia formaları giyen Pirlo’nun kariyerinde birçok başarı bulunuyor. 38 yaşındaki isim Milan’da forma giydiği dönemde İtalya Ligi, UEFA Şampiyonlar Ligi ve UEFA Süper Kupa’yı ikişer kez kazanma başarısı elde etti. Pirlo, Juventus’ta ise dört lig zaferine imza attı. İtalya Milli Takımı formasını 116 maçta sırtına geçiren Pirlo, 2006 FIFA Dünya Kupası’nda kupayı kaldırdı. Yıldız orta saha oyuncusu 2015 yılından beri ABD’de New York City forması giyiyordu. (İHA)

thread.title: Why you really can’t lose weight | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: Why you really can’t lose weight | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: Why you really can’t lose weight | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Why you really can’t lose weight 7th Nov 2017 6:19 AM Use this content by Susie Burrell 
WITH NEW findings from the National Heart Foundations Annual Health Survey reporting that half of all Australians aged between 25 and 49 are trying to lose weight is it any wonder that any new diet or food trend gets plenty of attention? 
Unfortunately this interest and attention does not mean we achieve success, in fact it could be argued that the more we diet and try to drop the kilos, the worse off we are with up to 60 per cent of Australians overweight or obese. 
So why do we not succeed when we try to lose weight? And how can we change this? 
1. We focus on restriction We often completely deny ourselves certain foods when we are ‘dieting’. 
While every one of us has a 'diet' that we follow each day - the reality is that most of us consider the word diet to mean a specific regimen that we follow for short periods of time that is restrictive in nature. 
Generally speaking we believe that a diet must be hard, have an element of punishment about it and must eliminate cut various types of foods or nutrients. 
The issue with this long term is that human beings do not like to feel restricted, and in fact once they do, psychologically they focus their attention on the restriction and as such prime themselves to want the exact foods they are avoiding. 
And this is the simple reason that most diets fail long term. 
The restriction cannot last forever and after a period of time we all return to our old, deeply entrenched eating habits and behaviours ultimately regaining any weight we have successfully lost. In turn, the only solution is to commit to dietary regimes in which we do not feel overly restricted - whether this includes regular 'cheats', treats or successfully incorporates social eating and special occasions. 
2. We are either "off" or "on" Who hasn’t stepped on the scales and instantly decided that they are going to start eating better? 
The idea of beginning each week "being good" or starting a new diet program each Monday lends itself to a dieting cycle in which we are either on or off a particular diet. 
This diet cycling not only means that we never achieve long term sustainable results but the constant process of losing a few kilos and then regaining them has a significant impact on our metabolism long term. 
Generally speaking each and every time we lose weight, our metabolism will be reduced, even slightly, which makes weight loss more and more difficult. For this reason, committing to long term eating patterns as opposed to quick fix weight loss tricks is the key to losing and then controlling weight long term. 
3. We do not focus on metabolism Many people view “healthy” foods as unappealing. 
When our focus is on "losing weight" or reducing calorie intake dramatically to see a quick change on the scales inevitably we lose a certain amount of muscle mass. 
As muscle mass is the type of body tissue that actually burns calories, dramatic calorie reductions that occur reasonably frequently over time combine to reduce metabolic rate, and eventually come to mean that calorie restriction and diets no longer get the results they once did when it comes to weight loss. 
Or put more simply, the body is no longer able to efficiently burn calories as it is so used to being calorie deprived at regular intervals. 
To avoid this scenario when we seek out weight loss we need to combine controlled calorie restriction with the type of training that increases muscle mass and as such helps to increase metabolic rate over time. 
This approach means we become better at burning calories as opposed to less efficient at burning them long term. 
4. We don't want to 
It is not so much that we do not want to lose weight, rather we do not want to do the things we need to do long-term to successfully lose weight and keep it off. 
For example, we do not want to cut back our portions, eat lightly to compensate for all the extras we enjoy, and we are more likely to skimp out on gym sessions than do more exercise to help compensate for the extra calories we are consuming. 
Modern life, in which we are working long hours, spend much of the day sitting and trying to cram as much into our lives as we can while eating whatever we want is not conducive to weight control. 
Ultimately most of us need to commit to moving more on a daily basis and eating less than we are used to if want to take control of our weight for good. Related Items

thread.title: Türkiye Finans, 279 milyon TL kâr açıkladı | Finans haberleri
thread.title_full: Türkiye Finans, 279 milyon TL kâr açıkladı | Finans haberleri

posts.title: Türkiye Finans, 279 milyon TL kâr açıkladı | Finans haberleri
posts.text:
Türkiye Finans, 279 milyon TL kâr açıkladı Türkiye Finans, 279 milyon TL kâr açıkladı Türkiye Finans, yılın 9 ayında 279 milyon lira kâr açıkladı. Bankanın net kârı geçen yılın aynı dönemine kıyasla yüzde 12 arttı. A + A - 07 Kasım 2017 
Türkiye Finans, üçüncüçeyrek sonuçlarını açıkladı. Yılın ilk dokuz ayında 279 milyon lira kâr elde eden banka geçen yılın aynı dönemine göre net dönem kârını yüzde 12 artırdı. İlk dokuz aylık dönemde bankanın aktif büyüklüğü ise 37, 3 milyar lira olarak gerçekleşti. 
Yılın 3. çeyreğinde bankanın toplam öz kaynakları 2016 yıl sonuna göre yüzde 9 artışla 4 milyar liraya yaklaştı. Türkiye Finans Katılım Bankası'nın 2016'nın aynı döneminde yıl sonunda yüzde 15.58 olan sermaye yeterlilik rasyosu, 2017'nin ilk dokuz ayında yüzde 18.29'a çıktı. 2017 yılının üçüncüçeyreğinde toplanan fonların tutarı 2017 3. çeyrek itibariyle 20,7 milyar TL seviyesinde gerçekleşti. 
Türkiye Finans Genel Müdürü ve Yönetim Kurulu Üyesi Wael Abdulaziz Raies, üçüncüçeyrek sonuçlarıyla ilgili, "2017'nin üçüncüçeyreğinde Türkiye Finans hedeflerini gerçekleştirme yolunda müşteri hizmetleri ve ürün çeşitliliği geliştirme konularında ciddi adımlar attı. Bunun yanı sıra reel ekonominin lokomotifi olan pek çok şirkete ve projeye inovatif ve müşteri odaklı bir anlayışla finansman sağladı" değerlendirmesinde bulundu. Yorumlar

thread.title: Doktor uyarısı: Kaşlarınızı sürekli ovuşturmayın
thread.title_full: Doktor uyarısı: Kaşlarınızı sürekli ovuşturmayın

posts.title: Doktor uyarısı: Kaşlarınızı sürekli ovuşturmayın
posts.text:
Yorum Yap Yazdır Facebook 'ta Paylaş Doktor uyarısı: Kaşlarınızı sürekli ovuşturmayın Kaşların özellikle kadınlar için yüz hattında oldukça önemli bir yere sahip olduğunu belirten Dr. Ata Nejat Ertek, kaşların sürekli ovuşturulmaması gerektiğini söyledi. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:58 
Kaşların özellikle kadınlar için yüz hattında oldukça önemli bir yere sahip olduğunu belirten Dr. Ata Nejat Ertek, kaşların sürekli ovuşturulmaması gerektiğini söyledi. 
Dermatec Polikliniği Dermatoloji Uzmanı Dr. Ata Nejat Ertek, “Kaşların sıklığı insandan insana değişen bir özelliğe sahiptir. Bazı insanlar gür kaşlı olmaktan bazıları ise seyrek kaşlı olmaktan yakınırlar. Kaşlar gözleri çerçeveleyerek yüzün farklı ifadelerinin oluşmasında büyük rol oynarlar. Bunun dışında düşünce ve duygularımızı ifade ederken meydana gelen mimiklere büyük katkı sağlarlar. Kaş dökülmesi farklı sebeplerle ve farklı şekillerde olabilmektedir” dedi. 
En sık görülen kaş dökülmesinin şekil vermek üzere kaş alımının yanlış yapılması sebebiyle köklerin zedelenmesi olduğunu ifade eden Dr. Ertek, “Buna halk arasında kaş küsmesi denir, kaş telleri zayıflayarak kaybolur. Kaş dökülmesi daha çok bayanlarda meydana gelir. Kaş dökülmesinin nedenleri şunlar olabilir; stres, kıl köklerini etkileyen cilt hastalıkları, bazı ilaçların yan etkisi, hormon dengesizlikleri ve hipotiroid hastalığı ve ayrıca strese bağlı olarak alopesi areta denilen ve bağışıklık sisteminin zayıflığına bağlı olarak hastalık sakal, saç ve kaşlarda geçici dökülmelere neden olabilir. Kaşların sürekli ovuşturulması sonucu yapılan travmalar kaş kayıplarına yol açabiliyor” diye konuştu. (İHA)

posts.author: Admin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: 'Insan inilah yang parti Lim Guan Eng (DAP) selalu dihina, fitnah, kecam tapi jelas hari ini insan itu tak berdendam' - Rizal Mansor
posts.text:
KUALA LUMPUR - Ketua Penolong Pengarah Kanan Bahagian Khas Pejabat Perdana Menteri, Datuk Rizal Mansor melalui Facebooknya berkata, walaupun Datin Seri Rosmah Mansor sering dihina, namun beliau tetap menunjukkan sikap mulia kepada mereka yang tidak menyukainya.  Rizal berkata, sikap itu jelas dilihat ketika isteri Perdana Menteri itu melawat Pulau Pinang hari ini.  "Insan inilah yang parti Lim Guan Eng (DAP) selalu hina, fitnah, kecam sampai tak ingat dunia. Tapi jelas hari ini insan yang sering dihina itu tak berdendam," tulisnya di Facebook. yang menunjukkan Lim Guan Eng menyambut ketibaan dan bersalaman dengan Rosmah di Lapangan Terbang di negeri Mutiara itu. 

Guan Eng sebelum itu menerusi Facebooknya memaklumkan beliau akan menyambut ketibaan Perdana Menteri Datuk Seri Najib Razak dan isterinya di Lapangan Terbang Tentera Udara Diraja Malaysia (TUDM), Butterworth bagi meninjau situasi banjir di negeri itu.  Dalam pertemuan itu juga, Najib diberi taklimat mengenai punca kejadian serta langkah-langkah jangka pendek bagi mengatasi masalah itu daripada Pengarah Jabatan Pengairan dan Saliran negeri, Sabri Abdul Mulok.

posts.author: Ajay Anuragi (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: महोत्तरीमा यस्तो छ, तीब्र प्रतिस्पर्धा
posts.text:
द एक्सक्लुसिभ सम्वाददाता
जनकपुरधाम 
आउँदो मंसिर २१ गते हुने प्रतिनिधि सभा तथा प्रदेश सभाको दोस्रोचरणको निर्वाचनका लागि महोत्तरी जिल्लामा विभिन्न दिग्गज नेता विरुद्ध विभिन्न नेता प्रतिस्पर्धीका रुपमा देखिएका छन् । मुख्य निर्वाचन अधिकृत ब्रजेश प्याकुरेलकाअनुसार महोत्तरीका चार प्रतिनिधि सभा र आठ प्रदेश सभा गरी जम्मा १२ पदका लागि २२३ जना उम्मेदवार प्रतिस्पर्धामा उत्रेका छन् । 
२ नम्बर प्रदेशको प्रतिनिधि तथा प्रदेश सभामा मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धामा उत्रेका अनुहारमा राजपा नेपालका संयोजक महन्थ ठाकुर, पूर्व मन्त्री गिरीराजमणि पोखरेल, शरतसिंह भण्डारी त्यस्तै पूर्व सांसद सीताराम भण्डारी, किरण यादव, भरतप्रसाद साह, कौशल यादव, सुरिता साह र स्वतन्त्रबाट चन्देश्वर झा लगायतका रहेका छन् । 
यहाँको प्रतिनिधि सभाको क्षेत्र नम्बर १ बाट नेकपा (माओवादी केन्द्र)का नेता गिरीराजमणि पोखरेल, नेपाली काँग्रेसका पूर्व सांसद सीताराम भण्डारी र गठबन्धनका तर्फबाट संघीय समाजवादी फोरम नेपालका लक्ष्मी महतोबीच मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धा रहेको छ । 
त्यस्तै त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र नं १ मा नेपाली काँगे्रसका तर्फबाट स्थानीय तहको निर्वाचनमा बर्दिवास नगरपालिकाबाट पराजित हुनुभएका युवा नेता प्रह्लादकुमार क्षेत्री, माओवादी केन्द्रका राजु खड्का, एमालेकी शारदादेवी थापा र राजपा नेपालकी रुपाकुमारी यादव बीच मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धा हुने देखिएको छ । त्यसैगरी त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र नं २ मा नेकपा माओवादीका भरतप्रसाद साह, नेपाली काँग्रेसका रामश्रेष्ठ महतो, संघीय समाजवादी फोरम नेपालका विनोदकुमार महतो र नयाँ शक्ति पार्टी नेपाल काशी महतोबीच मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धा हुने देखिएको छ । 
महोत्तरीको प्रतिनिधि सभाको क्षेत्र नं २ बाट राजपा नेपालका नेता शरतसिंह भण्डारी, नेपाली काँग्रेसकी किरण यादव, नेकपा माओवादी केन्द्रका कासिम नदाफ मुख्य प्रतिपर्धीका रुपमा देखिएका छन् । 
त्यस्तै त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा क्षेत्र नं १ मा राजपा नेपालका जयनुल राईन, नेपाली काँग्रेसका सुशीलकुमार यादव र नेकपा माओवादी केन्द्रका राजकिशोर यादव मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धीका रुपमा देखिएका छन् । 
त्यसैगरी त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा क्षेत्र नं २ मा राजपा नेपालका सुरिताकुमारी साह, नेपाली काँग्रेसका राजकरणप्रसाद साह सुडी, नेकपा माओवादी केन्द्रका अजयकुमार यादव मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धी देखिएका छन् । 
जिल्लाको प्रतिनिधि सभाको क्षेत्र नं ३ मा राजपा नेपालका संयोजक महन्थ ठाकुर, नेपाली काँग्रेसका बजरंग नेपाली, नेकपा एमालेका विजयकुमार चौधरी र पूर्व स्वतन्त्र सांसद चन्देश्वर झा मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धीका रुपमा रहेका छन् । 
त्यसैगरी त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा क्षेत्र नं १ मा नेकपा माओवादी केन्द्रका रामआधार कापर, नेपाली काँग्रेसका शम्भुनारायण पाठक, राजपा नेपालका अभिराम शर्मा मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धीका रुपमा रहेका छन् । 
त्यस्तै त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा क्षेत्र नं २ मा राजपा नेपालकी रानीकुमारी तिवारी, नेकपा एमालेका विजयकुमार कर्ण, नेपाली काँग्रेसका पवन साह मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धी रहेका छन् । 
महोत्तरी जिल्लाको प्रतिनिधि सभाको क्षेत्र नं ४ बाट नेपाली काँग्रेसका जिल्ला सभापति महेन्द्रकुमार राय, संघीय समाजवादी फोरम नेपालका डा सुरेन्द्रकुमार यादव, नेकपा माओवादी केन्द्रका मो रजी हैदर मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धी रहेका छन् । त्यसैगरी त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र नं १ मा संघीय समाजवादी फोरम नेपालका कौशलकुमार यादव, नेपाली काँग्रेसका गोखुल राय यादव, नेकपा माओवादी केन्द्रका रामबाबु चौधरी मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धी रहेका छन् । 
त्यस्तै त्यस क्षेत्रको प्रदेश सभाको क्षेत्र नं २ मा संघीय समाजवादी फोरम नेपालका सरोजकुमार सिंह, नेकपा एमालेका सरोजकुमार यादव नेपाली काँग्रेसका दिप्यांशुप्रताप सिंह मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धी रहेका छन् ।

posts.author: ABC News Radio
posts.title: Texas church shooting survivor played dead as gunman searched for ‘more people to shoot’
posts.text:
Nov 7, 2017 | National News 
ABCNews.com (SUTHERLAND SPRINGS, Texas) — One of the survivors of Sunday’s massacre at a church in Sutherland Springs, Texas, described the terror she felt when suspect Devin Kelley unloaded a hail of gunfire on the churchgoers. 
Rosanne Solis told ABC News that she was certain she was going to die when the gunman began firing. “I’m gonna die, I knew I was gonna die, I knew ’cause the shots were going to close to my head,” she said. “… I didn’t want to die.” 
Solis said that at first, everybody started screaming when the suspect began shooting, but then it grew silent as he made his way through the church, stopping to reload several times. 
“He was shooting the people on the floor, they were on the ground already bleeding,” she said. “… They were scared. Nobody was about to say a word. … I would not even move, I would not even make a sound.” 
She added: “You could hear a pin drop in there, silence. Real quiet. … I knew if I said something he was gonna kill me, he was looking for people to shoot more people to shoot.” 
As she lay on the ground, Solis prayed for help, she said, and played dead so as not to attract the shooter’s attention. 
“I played dead and I made sure that I hid myself good under [a] bench,” she said, adding that a boy and a woman hid with her. 
When Solis was hit by one of the bullets, she said she didn’t even feel the pain. That came later, she said. 
After help arrived, Solis said she saw bodies scattered around her as she stumbled out of the building. Twenty-six people died in the shooting, which is the worst mass shooting in state history. Eight members of the extended Holcombe family were among the dead. 
Kelley, 26, later took his own life, according to officials. While authorities have not released a specific motive, they said this morning the suspect’s mother-in-law had attended the church and that the suspect had “expressed anger toward” her and sent “threatening texts.” 
Solis, who was shot in the shoulder and only just returned home this evening, said she didn’t know why she survived but is thankful she did. 
“I feel so sorry for the people that lost their loved ones,” she said.

thread.title: Tỷ phú Jack Ma và mối quan hệ với dàn sao đình đám bậc nhất
thread.title_full: Tỷ phú Jack Ma và mối quan hệ với dàn sao đình đám bậc nhất

posts.title: Tỷ phú Jack Ma và mối quan hệ với dàn sao đình đám bậc nhất
posts.text: Tỷ phú Jack Ma và mối quan hệ với dàn sao đình đám bậc nhất An An (Tổng hợp) Thứ Ba, ngày 07/11/2017 16:09 PM (GMT+7) (Dân Việt) Là "vua" trên thương trường, tỷ phú giàu nhất Trung Quốc này cũng rất mật thiết với các sao giải trí. Cát-xê "không tưởng" cho tỷ phú Jack Ma trong siêu phẩm võ thuật sắp ra mắt Nhân chuyến thăm Việt Nam của tỷ phú Jack Ma, cùng điểm lại những hình ảnh đáng chú ý của tỷ phú giàu nhất Trung Quốc này với các ngôi sao đình đám trong làng giải trí. Lý Liên Kiệt là một trong những người bạn thân thiết với Jack Ma. Hai người thường chụp hình chung, tham gia một số dự án và mới đây nhất cả hai đóng chung trong phim Công Thủ Đạo do Jack Ma đầu tư sản xuất để quảng bá về Thái Cực quyền. Lý Liên Kiệt cũng là cổ đông lớn của tập đoàn Alibaba trong khi Jack Ma là người đầu tiên tham gia vào quỹ từ thiện do siêu sao võ thuật họ Lý lập nên. Với Thành Long, tình thân giữa ngôi sao hành động với tỷ phú thương trường đủ để hai người khoác vai nhau đi trên phố. Nhờ có mối quan hệ thân tình với dàn sao võ thuật đình đám nên dự án phim Công Thủ Đạo lần này, Jack Ma vừa là nhà sản xuất vừa là diễn viên chính, đồng thời kêu gọi được nhiều ngôi sao cùng tham gia như Lý Liên Kiệt, Chân Tử Đan, Ngô Kinh, Tony Jaa... Điều bất ngờ Jack Ma chính là fan của "ông vua phim hài" Châu Tinh Trì. Trong buổi giao lưu với sinh viên tại Trung Quốc vào năm 2013, cả hai cho biết họ có nhiều điểm chung về tư tưởng. Jack Ma suýt chút nữa đã vào vai Tôn Ngộ Không trong dự án phim Tây Du Ký ngoại truyện của Châu Tinh Trì. Jack Ma và Châu Tinh Trì trong buổi giao lưu Mối quan hệ thân thiết giữa tỷ phú Jack Ma và tiểu thuyết gia Kim Dung rất đặc biệt. Trong cuốn Đây chính là Jack Ma (xuất bản ở Việt Nam với tên Tôi là Jack Ma ) có tiết lộ nhiều câu chuyện về tình bạn này cùng sự ảnh hưởng của tiểu thuyết kiếm hiệp tới việc thành lập tập đoàn Alibaba. Không chỉ thân thiết với các ngôi sao võ thuật, Jack Ma còn được coi là "người hùng" đứng sau thành công của bóng hồng Triệu Vy. Jack Ma cũng chính là người trợ giúp khá nhiều cho sự nghiệp kinh doanh của gia đình Triệu Vy. Năm 2015 Triệu Vy từng gây choáng khi bỏ 400 triệu USD đầu tư cùng tỷ phú Jack Ma. Từ lâu tình thân giữa tỷ phú này với vợ chồng Triệu Vy cũng như ngôi sao Lý Liên Kiệt đã rất bền chặt. Vợ chồng Angela Baby, Huỳnh Hiểu Minh cũng từng chụp hình chung với Jack Ma. Bên cạnh các siêu sao của làng giải trí Trung Quốc, tỷ phú Jack Ma và ngôi sao võ thuật Thái Lan Tony Jaa cũng rất thân thiết. Tỷ phú giàu nhất Trung Quốc cũng có dịp đứng chung sự kiện cùng vợ chồng David Beckham. Nhập ý kiến của bạn ở đây Đăng lên Facebook

thread.title: Persatuan Bola Sepak England Tertua Di Dunia
thread.title_full: Persatuan Bola Sepak England Tertua Di Dunia

posts.author: Admin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Persatuan Bola Sepak England Tertua Di Dunia
posts.text:
Persatuan Bola Sepak England adalah badan yang mentadbir hal-ehwal bola sepak di England yang dibentuk pada tahun 1863 dan merupakan persatuan bola sepak paling tua di dunia serta bertanggungjawab memantau segala aspek bagi perlawanan amatur atau profesional di England. 
Persatuan Bola Sepak, atau biasanya dipanggil FA, merupakan badan penyelia persatuan bola sepak di England. Dibentuk pada tahun 1863, ia merupakan persatuan bola sepak tertua di dunia dan bertanggung jawab bagi menyelia kesemua aspek pemainan amatur dan profesional di England.
FA mengesahkan semua perlawanan bola sepak persaingan di England pada tahap kebangsaan dan secara tidak langsung pada peringkat tempatan melalui Persatuan Bola Sepak County.
Ia mengurus beberapa pertandingan, yang paling terkenal adalah Piala FA.
Ia turut bertanggung jawab bagi melantik pengurusan pasukan bola sepak kebangsaan Inggeris, pasukan bola sepak kebangsaan wanita England dan pasukan bola sepak bawah 17 tahun kebangsaan England .
FA merupakan ahli kepada UEFA dan FIFA dan menjawat kerusi tetap dalam Badan Persatuan Bola Sepak Antarabangsa (International Football Association Board-IFAB) yang bertanggungjawab bagi peraturan perlawanan.
Sebagai persatuan bola sepak pertama, ia tidak menggunakan nama kebangsaan "Inggeris" dalam namanya. FA bertempat di Stadium Wembley, London.
Kesemua pasukan bola sepak profesional England merupakan ahli Persatuan Bola Sepak.
Sungguhpun ia tidak menguruskan operasi hari ke sehari bagi Liga Utama (Premier League), ia memiliki kuasa veto bagi perlantikan Pengerusi Liga dan sebarang perubahan pada peraturan liga.
Liga Bola Sepak yang terdiri dari liga profesional di bawah Liga Utama adalah ditadbir sendiri.
Semoga memberi manfaat.
BACA INI JUGA: England, Negara Samseng Bola Sepak Paling Ganas Di Dunia
sumber: wikipedia

thread.title_full: Week ONE clear liquids - General Gastric Sleeve Surgery Discussion - BariatricPal

posts.author: TheNewMrsR
posts.text:
I am scheduled for surgery in 2 days (Nov 8). I am starting to feel anxious about coming home and being able to get my Protein and liquids. Could someone post a menu sample of what you drank/ate and how often? I haven't been able to find a daily guide for week one. My surgeon requires 64 oz of liquid per day and 80-100oz of protein. Help?!?!? I am getting stressed!
Every surgeon is different. What did yours advise you when you went to meet for your pre-op appointment?
Mine doesn't require a clear liquid diet after the first day so I'm on shakes and stuff like pudding , cottage cheese , ricotta cheese, cream Soups etc. I have to get down 64 ounces of liquid and 70-80 grams of protein each day. It's supposed to take me 10 minutes to drink every ounce but I can drink a couple ounces in that time.
I left the hospital the day after surgery on the stage 3 phase of my plan. I've heard my doctor is more generous as other doctors require clear broths and liquids for the first 2-3 weeks. Please ask you doctor what plan he follows!!!
There's a good variety of protein Water on the market that will help you meet your protein goals. I found mine on Amazon or at the grocery. They are too sweet so I water them down about 50/50. I get about two bottles for each one which also helps with your liquid requirements. I struggle with meeting my requirements. It feels like an all day constant chore and I sometimes forget to sip for a couple hours and that can throw me way off track.
Sent from my XT1635-01 using BariatricPal mobile app

thread.title: Pfaffen
thread.title_full: Pfaffen

posts.title: Pfaffen
posts.text:
07. November 2017 Pfaffen 
Der November hat keinen guten Ruf. Der Oktober hat zuletzt noch Halloween mitgenommen und dann endgültig den Herbst eingeläutet. Früchte des Pfaffenhütchens 
November bringt Novembergrau, Novembersturm, Novemberkälte, Allerheiligen (den Shoppingtag der katholischen Bundesländer), Allerseelen, Totensonntag, Volkstrauertag, alles nicht gerade Stimmungsaufheller. Und den Buß- und Bettag..., der früher mal Feiertag war, bis die neuen Bundesländer kamen und die Wirtschaft schrie, wir brauchen Umsatz für mehr Geld und rabotti-rabotti und dann war er futsch, der schöne Bett-Tag. Wie schade. Denn "ich bin morgens immer müde, aber Abends bin ich" - nein, auch nicht wach. Herbstmüdigkeit. Die Winterzeit hat uns zur Uhrenumstellung gezwungen und es wird jetzt schon am späten Nachmittag dunkel. Bis zum 21. Dezember geht es abwärts mit der Helligkeit. 
Da hilft nur frische Luft, ein Spaziergang und wenn er auch windumtost ist. Einmal am Mittellandkanal entlang. Dort tragen die Büsche rote Früchte und die Vögel naschen: Pfaffenhütchen. 
Eigentlich heißt der Busch Euonymus, Spindelstrauch. Er blüht klein und weiß und recht unauffällig. Seinen großen Auftritt hat er erst im Herbst. Dann reifen die Früchte und die Blätter verfärben sich wunderbar rot, vorausgesetzt er steht schön sonnig. 
Die Tiere lieben ihn: die Insekten und Spinnen und leider die Blattläuse und die Gespinstmotte, die es schafft, den Busch komplett kahlzufressen. Er treibt danach zwar neu aus, aber die vielen krabbelnden Raupen der Motte sind so gar nicht mein Ding. 

Die Früchte sind Vogelfutter, lecker Vogelfutter, offenbar mit Suchtfaktor. ABER für den Menschen hochgiftig, und der Rest der Pflanze auch. 
Was wir nicht pflücken, können wir umso länger anschauen. Diese Farben, diese Mischung aus rot-pink und orange, orientalische Farben. Und die Form, die an eine Bischofsmütze erinnert und deshalb den Pfaffennamen gegeben hat. Das passt doch zum November. Und zur kommenden Weihnachtszeit. Oder?

thread.title: 'Ya, memang saya ditahan'
thread.title_full: 'Ya, memang saya ditahan'

posts.author: Admin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: 'Ya, memang saya ditahan'
posts.text:
PELAKON Nadzmi Adhwa mengakui dia adalah pelakon yang ditahan polis akibat kesalahan dadah di Jalan Bukit Setiawangsa, Taman Setiawangsa, Kuala Lumpur, awal pagi Jumaat lalu.
Nadzmi, 25, dalam satu kenyataan melalui syarikat pengurusannya, Mindorder Sdn Bhd mendakwa, dia terperangkap sehingga ditahan kerana terlalu mempercayai rakan baik.
"Selepas ditahan, baru saya tahu rakan saya itu sudah lama dalam pemerhatian polis atas kesalahan memiliki ganja. Nasib tidak menyebelahi saya kerana turut ada bersama ketika polis menahannya.
"Kesilapan saya kerana terlalu mempercayai rakan dan terpengaruh. Pengalaman ditahan polis memberi banyak pengajaran kepada saya supaya lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih kawan,” katanya.
Nadzmi berkata, dia yakin tidak bersalah dalam perkara ini dan sudah pun dibebaskan tidak sampai 24 jam selepas ditahan.
"Saya memohon maaf atas kesilapan yang dilakukan dan tidak mahu mengulangi kesilapan sama lagi," katanya.
Harian Metro hari ini melaporkan pelakon drama Hati Perempuan itu ditahan bersama rakan dan adiknya ketika menaiki kereta jenis Honda Jazz.
Mereka ditahan sepasukan polis dari Jabatan Siasatan Jenayah Narkotik (JSJN) Ibu Pejabat Polis Daerah Wangsa Maju berhampiran sebuah stesen minyak selepas curiga dengan tindak-tanduk mereka.
Hasil pemeriksaan di dalam kereta dinaiki, polis menemui satu tin berisi daun ganja dan ganja mampat disembunyikan di tempat duduk belakang pemandu.
Turut ditemui botol lut sinar yang diubah suai dipercayai alatan dapur untuk menghisap ganja.

thread.title: Trump's gaffe: 'I never knew there were so many countries' | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: Trump's gaffe: 'I never knew there were so many countries' | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: Trump's gaffe: 'I never knew there were so many countries' | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Use this content by Staff writers 
US PRESIDENT Donald Trump has offered some startlingly candid remarks at an official banquet in Japan, sharing with a room full of dignitaries his initial inexperience as a newly elected leader, and confiding that he had been unaware how many countries there were in the world. 
Mr Trump was speaking at the Akasaka Palace in Tokyo during the first leg of his epic five-country visit of Asia when he made the remarks, which were intermittently translated for the mainly Japanese-speaking crowd. 
It was not immediately clear whether the US President was speaking with a flippant flourish, or whether he literally did not know how many countries are in the world. 
Mr Trump was referencing a meeting he had with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in New York in November last year, just over a week after his surprise election win. 
Their relationship got off to a "rocky start", Mr Trump said. 
US President Donald Trump talks with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe at the opening of a welcome dinner hosted by Abe at Akasaka Palac. Picture: AFP/Shizuo Kambayashi 
"So my relationship with Shinzo got off to quite a rocky start because I never ran for office, and here I am. But I never ran, so I wasn't very experienced. And after I had won, everybody was calling me from all over the world. I never knew we had so many countries." 
"I didn't know you were supposed to not see world leaders until after you were in office which was January 20th," he continued. 
"You were just not supposed to because it was considered bad form. It was not a nice thing to do and I understand that from the standpoint of the president whose place you were taking." 
Mr Trump's Asian tour moves on to South Korea today. 
According to Google, there are 195 countries in the world today, 193 of which are full members of the United Nations, and two (the Holy See and Palestine) which have non-member 'observer' status.

Vách ngăn vệ sinh Ngăn vệ sinh giá rẻ Compact HPL không gây ảnh hưởng đến môi trường.ngày nay nó thường được sử dụng nhiều trong các tòa nhà, văn phòng, khách sạn, cà phê, trong các sở ban ngành, trong các khu chế xuất, khu công nghiệp, trong bể bơi, trong du thuyền, bể bơi, ngân hàng, nhà hàng, bệnh viện, bến xe, toilet công cộng, trường học, quán bar, ... bởi sự tiện dụng của nó.Tại Việt Nam những năm gần đây vách ngăn vệ sinh đã không còn quá xa lạ với người tiêu dùng nhưng ít ai hiểu hết được việc tiện lợi cũng như cách thức trong việc sự dụng chúngNhư đã nói ở trên tấm compact hpl làm Vách ngăn vệ sinh Compact HPL có nhiều ưu điểm, không làm ảnh hưởng đến môi trường vì thế vách ngăn vệ sinh compact HPL được đánh giá cao và thường được sử dụng nhiều trong các tòa nhà, văn phòng, khách sạn, ngân hàng, bệnh viện, bến xe, toilet công cộng, trường học, quán bar, cà phê, trong các sở ban ngành….Vách ngăn vệ sinh Compact HPL nó chịu tác động chùi rửa lớn trong một thời gian dài , tấm Compact HPL không bị ảnh hưởng của thời tiết, không bị biến đổi màu hay bị mục nát so với vách vệ sinh sử dụng gỗ mfc , Với mẫu mã màu sắc đa dạng chất liệu bền đẹp, giá cả hợp lý dễ dàng cho việc di chuyển, là sự lựa chọn hoàn hảo nhất . vách ngăn vệ sinh compact hpl Khu vực vệ sinh được đầu tư khá hiện đại và cao cấp. Chủ đầu tư nên chọn loại vách ngăn và cửa toilet bằng tấm compact, là loại nguyên vật liệu cao cấp và hiện chỉ được sử dụng tại một số toà nhà cao cấp. Chúng tôi thi công vách ngăn vệ sinh compact và làm vách ngăn vệ sinh mfc giá rẻ, loại vách ngăn vệ sinh compact hpl composte mfc do chúng tôi thi công được bảo hành 12 tháng, tất cả sản phẩm vách ngăn vệ sinh giá rẻ đều chất lượng
Ngăn vệ sinh giá rẻ Compact HPL không gây ảnh hưởng đến môi trường.ngày nay nó thường được sử dụng nhiều trong các tòa nhà, văn phòng, khách sạn, cà phê, trong các sở ban ngành, trong các khu chế xuất, khu công nghiệp, trong bể bơi, trong du thuyền, bể bơi, ngân hàng, nhà hàng, bệnh viện, bến xe, toilet công cộng, trường học, quán bar, ... bởi sự tiện dụng của nó.Tại Việt Nam những năm gần đây vách ngăn vệ sinh đã không còn quá xa lạ với người tiêu dùng nhưng ít ai hiểu hết được việc tiện lợi cũng như cách thức trong việc sự dụng chúng. Việc chúng ta đề cao việc giữ vệ sinh chung để đề phòng bệnh tật hay tạo ra một không gian lành mạnh và thực sự riêng tư thì mục đích của việc sử dụng vách ngăn cũng như thế tuy rằng nó cũng có hơi bất tiện với những không gian quá nhỏ hẹp. Hiện tại trên thị trường các mặt hàng vách ngăn khá đa dạng như vách ngăn di động,vách ngăn phòng,vách ngăn vệ sinh, vách ngăn văn phòng, vách ngăn bàn làm việc, vách tiểu, , vách kính cường lực, ngăn buồng tắm
Xin quý khách lưu ý: Đối với nội thất văn phòng, nhà ở, chung cư thì chỉ cần sử dụng ván MFC tiêu chuẩn, còn đối với những không gian, khu vực ẩm ướt như Toilet, tủ bếp, tủ Toilet, vách Toilet, Lavabo, khu vệ sinh thì nên sử dụng ván MFC chống ẩm hoặc melamine trên nền MDF chống ẩm V313.
Vách ngăn vệ sinh MFC làm từ 1 loại gỗ đặc biệt sản xuất từ các hạt gỗ liên kết bởi keo công nghiệp ép được dưới áp suất cao.Bề mặt của tấm là 1 lớp melamine chống xước,chống nước.Nhờ cấu tạo đặc biệt từ các hạt gỗ xanh trong lõi mà tấm MFC có khả năng chịu được môi trường ẩm ướt.vách ngăn toilet nên chọn công ty có uy tín chất lượng để thi công nếu các bạn là đối tác lâu thì sẽ đảm bảo, tránh mua của các đơn vị mới chưa có kinh nghiệm, chưa có tìm hiểu kỹ, cũng vì lợi nhuận và sự cạnh tranh nên hiện nay cả công ty uy tín và có thương hiệu cũng gian lận trong thi công vách ngăn sử dụng tấm Compact HPL nhập chính hãng và kém chất lượng, do đó khi ký biên bản nghiệm thu bàn giao công trình quý khách hàng phải xem xét kỹ nhất là phần tấm ngăn giữa vách ngăn nhà vệ sinh và tấm bạ bên hông cửa dùng tấm compact.

posts.text:
Nëse po mendoni për ndonjë operacion plastik së fundmi,hidhini një sy këtyre fotove! November 7, 2017 10:30 
Operacionet plastike janë gjithnjë e më shumë të përhapura,madje së fundmi edhe në Shqipëri.Debati në duhet apo jo,vazhdon po njësoj por me vitet po bëhet më e pranueshme ideja e ndërhyrjeve për sa kohë ndikojnë në vetbesimin e njeriut. 
Por ka disa shembuj që tregojnë,se duhet padyshim të ketë një limit. 
Hidhini një sy 10 rasteve që kanë bërë bujë,dhe gjykojini vetë. 
Katie Price

posts.title: Kartal sahilinde kimliği belirsiz erkek cesedi bulundu
posts.text:
Kartal sahilinde kimliği belirsiz erkek cesedi bulundu İstanbul Kartal sahilinde bir erkek cesedi bulundu. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:38 
İstanbul Kartal sahilinde bir erkek cesedi bulundu. 
Olay, sabah saatlerinde Kartal Atalar Mahallesi Atalar Sahilinde meydana geldi. Edinilen bilgilere göre, sabah spor yapmak için sahile giden vatandaşlar denizde hareketsiz yatan bir kişi olduğunu fark etti. Vatandaşların ihbarı üzerine olay yerine polis, itfaiye, deniz polisi ve sağlık ekibi sevk edildi. 
Olay yerine gelen deniz polisi ve itfaiye ekipleri cesedi çıkarmak için çalışma başlattı. Yapılan çalışmaların ardından kıyıya çıkarılan cesedin bir erkeğe ait olduğu anlaşıldı. Olay yeri ekiplerinin yaptığı çalışmalar sonuncunda ise, yaklaşık 35 yaşlarında olduğu tahmin edilen cesedin üzerinden kimlik çıkmadı. 
Ceset otopsi yapılmak üzere Adli Tıp Kurumu’na kaldırılırken, polis ekipleri olayla ilgili inceleme başlattı. (Cenk İşver/İHA)

thread.title: Tackle benefit issues or foodbanks could struggle to meet demand, charity warns
thread.title_full: Tackle benefit issues or foodbanks could struggle to meet demand, charity warns

posts.author: PA
posts.title: Tackle benefit issues or foodbanks could struggle to meet demand, charity warns
posts.text:
Tackle benefit issues or foodbanks could struggle to meet demand, charity warns By PA 7 Nov 2017, 7:16 - 
Foodbanks could struggle to meet demand this winter unless urgent action is taken to improve Universal Credit (UC), the Government is being warned. 
The Trussell Trust said it was on course to deliver a record number of food parcels from its 428 foodbanks across the UK during the current financial year. 
The charity revealed it has distributed 586,907 emergency supplies in the six months to September, over 67,000 more than during the same period last year. #Foodbanks in areas of full #UniversalCredit saw 17% increase in 2016-17, more than 2x national average of 7% > https://t.co/eeMC493L4y pic.twitter.com/dSafS6hmOO 
-- The Trussell Trust (@TrussellTrust) October 18, 2017 
More than 200,000 supplies went to children, while on average, during the past year, people needed around two parcels each. 
Foodbanks in areas in which UC has been rolled out for at least six months have seen a 30% increase in demand compared to the year before. 
The Trust said the six-week wait for UC should be cut as a matter of urgency. Administration of the benefit needs to be improved, while the Government should reassess the freeze on benefit levels, the Trust said. "All I wanted was a lift up to get me back on my feet, but I was waiting for 9 weeks for #UniversalCredit & needed the #foodbank " pic.twitter.com/wU4EysTffs 
-- The Trussell Trust (@TrussellTrust) October 18, 2017 
Interim chief executive Mark Ward said: "We're seeing soaring demand at foodbanks across the UK. Our network is working hard to stop people going hungry but the simple truth is that even with the enormous generosity of our donors and volunteers we're concerned that foodbanks could struggle to meet demand this winter if critical changes to benefit delivery are not made now." 
A Department for Work and Pensions spokesman said: "The reasons for food bank use are wide and complex, and for this report to link it to any one issue would be misleading. 
"We're clear that advance payments are widely available from the start of anyone's UC claim, and urgent cases are fast-tracked so no-one should be without funds. We know the majority of UC claimants are confident in managing their money. Budgeting support and direct rent payments to landlords are also available to those who need them." I've been inundated with cases of people affected by the horrors of #universalcredit The Gov't cannot be allowed to ignore & must act. pic.twitter.com/xby4ivKVu5 
-- Debbie Abrahams (@Debbie_abrahams) October 24, 2017 
Debbie Abrahams, shadow work and pensions secretary, said: "The shocking 30% increase in foodbank use in areas where Universal Credit has been fully rolled out is further evidence of the desperate need for a pause to the programme while it is fixed. 
"As well as foodbank use, the six week wait for support and cuts to the programme are also driving debt, arrears and even evictions. The social security system is supposed to prevent people from going hungry and getting into debt, not make these problems worse." 
Oxfam's head of UK poverty, Rachael Orr, said: "These figures are shocking but worryingly they are probably just the tip of the iceberg. Oxfam works with many more independent foodbanks who are seeing a similar rise. 
"We are increasingly concerned that the way Universal Credit is being rolled out is causing unnecessary hardship. The Government needs to urgently rethink and cut the six-week wait." Cutting the six-week wait for UC payments would cost £150-200m. Must be done as the majority of new UC claimants are paid weekly/fortnightly pic.twitter.com/3Mww9zTJBZ 
-- ResolutionFoundation (@resfoundation) October 31, 2017 
The Archbishop of Canterbury, Justin Welby, said: "Figures on foodbank use in Britain are utterly shocking. Many households in the UK are just one crisis away from needing assistance of this kind. It is a scandal that in 21st century Britain we have need of them at all. 
"I am grateful for the tens of thousands of incredible volunteers - many of them Christians, but not exclusively - who give their time to ensure those who are hungry are helped. 
"There is now a network of approximately 2,000 foodbanks right across the United Kingdom. There are collection points in many churches, and baskets and boxes in most supermarkets encouraging people to donate. 
"We must strive to ensure that foodbanks do not simply become a staple necessity, and consider how we can help those in real poverty move to a better place in their lives." posts.text:
opera di Andrew Wyeth Che questo non sia più dinanzi a me - Rainer Maria Rilke 

Che questo non sia più dinanzi a me da cui distante oso volgere il viso: strade aperte, cielo, terre – e il sorriso di nessun volto caro che le confonda. 
Tutta la pena dei possibili amori giorno e notte ho sentito tornare: confusi un tempo e remoti, ma uguali nel rifiutarmi una gioia serena. 
Nessuna notte futura più dolce sarà di quella notte lontana, quando allo sguardo di noi rassegnati ogni discordia di nuovo fu piana. 
Accanto a lei innamorata nel sonno forse il distacco sembrava più lieve. Il male per questo dolce volere dell’amica che dorme, una donna. 
Quando ogni cosa che soli ci ha avuti stupiva come di un tradimento, – ora tu sai che la candela brucia se per angoscia il tuo lume si è spento 
Sempre di nuovo, benché sappiamo il paesaggio d’amore e il breve cimitero con i suoi tristi nomi e il pauroso abisso silente, dove per gli altri è la fine: torniamo a coppie tuttavia di nuovo tra gli antichi alberi, ci posiamo sempre, di nuovo, tra i fiori contro il cielo. 
traduzione di Giaime Pintor

posts.title: Binayı bir anda alevler sardı
posts.text:
Yorum Yap Yazdır Facebook 'ta Paylaş Binayı bir anda alevler sardı Manisa’da sabaha karşı tadilatta olan bir iş yerinde başlayan yangın, binanın ön cephesinde bulunan mantolamayı da tutuşturunca 6 katlı bina kullanılamaz hale geldi. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:32 
Manisa’da sabaha karşı tadilatta olan bir iş yerinde başlayan yangın, binanın ön cephesinde bulunan mantolamayı da tutuşturunca 6 katlı bina kullanılamaz hale geldi. 
Yangın, sabaha karşı saat 04.30 sıralarında Manisa’nın Şehzadeler ilçesine bağlı Peker Mahallesi’nde meydana geldi. Edinilen bilgiye göre, 6 katlı binanın girişinde bulunan ve tadilatta olan bir kafede elektrik kontağından yangın çıktı. Dükkanın içerisini saran alevler daha sonra dükkanın önünü kapatmak için bulunan brandayı tutuşturdu. Dükkanda büyüyen alevler ve tutuşan branda binanın dış cephe kaplaması olan mantolamayı da tutuşturunca alevler bütün binayı bir anda sardı. Binadakilerin ve çevredeki vatandaşların haber vermesi üzerine olay yerine çok sayıda Manisa Büyükşehir Belediyesi İtfaiye Amirliği ekipleri sevk edildi. Ekiplerin hızlı müdahalesine rağmen yangın güçlükle söndürülebildi. Ölen ya da yaralananın bulunmadığı yangında bina kullanılamaz hale geldi. İlk 3 katı boş olan binada son 3 katta kalan vatandaşlar yangını fark etmeleriyle birlikte binayı terk etti. Dumanların merdivenlere ulaşmaması ise olası bir faciayı önledi. 
"ANNEM 1 DAKİKAYLA KENDİNİ KURTARMIŞ" 
Ablası Zeliha San ile kalan annesi Ayşe Çatal’ın kendisini son anda kurtardığını söyleyen binanın 4. kat sahibi Tahir Çatal, "95 yaşındaki annem 1 dakikayla kendini kurtarmış. Tam da yanan yerde, salonda takırtılar olduğunu duyuyor. O anda uyanmış, alevler sarmış. 1 dakikayla kurtarmış kendisini. Hatta ayakkabılarını giyemeden merdivenlerden çıkarmışlar. Zorla yürüyordu. Ben de sabah 05.00’te geldim. Ev komple yanmış. Öbür taraflara da girilecek gibi değil" dedi. 
Büyük maddi hasarın meydana geldiği yangınla ilgili soruşturma başlatıldı. (Aykut Yeniçağ /İHA)

posts.author: 冷林熙 冷林熙 当前在线
posts.text:
天 府 蜀 都 赋 冷 林 熙 （再次修订稿）
 茫茫世界，泱泱寰宇，名城丽都，胜星若辰。巡五洲辽阔之内陆，游四海绚烂之屿滨；仰东方耀眼之明珠，比中外夺目之要津；古老而鲜新之蜀都，其“历史文化，幸福宜居，休闲旅游”之名优特色，尤显脱颖而鲜明矣! 古今之谓蜀都，故国之首府，世界之名城；天府之臓腹，华西之中心。得天时地利之独厚，拥人和造化之传承。捧雪山银岭之泉瀑，而巧引岷水兴农桑；携都江古堰之甘露，而妙绕城乡惠众生。修府南，还锦江清流而一举震惊全球；治沙河，造新城绿洲而再夺国际“首金”。古迹名胜，精典人文，尽展古蜀文化之盖世渊源；名山秀水，倩女佳丽，彰显地域风貌之独特神韵。诗云：“天开蜀都一方寸，乾转坤动举重轻。二十余个区县域，千五百万好居民。壮丽山河如画卷，风光无限醉神魂，国级中心秀华夏，昔砥今砺大美臻”。
 纵观有史之实，天灾人祸，水火刀兵；沧海桑田，地覆天倾。神州圣地，数“天府之国”常秀；西川故土，唯蜀都之域中兴。悠悠秦汉古城，经几千年英名不改；浩浩天府沃野，历数百代城乡繁盛。
 遥想夏商春秋，中华先贤世祖，开蜀汉文化之先河，奠华夏文明之固本。叹皇天后土，千古尘封，斑斑遗跡，宗宗谜痕；惑代代子孙于数十世纪之间。庆芙蓉国里，锦官城下，屡屡发掘，每每揭秘，方展古国之青史，以慰大众之心膺。
 蚕丛史话，记宗祖农桑之本源；杜鹃啼血，开耕耘时令之春讯；水利天府，感都江伟业始祖之李冰；芙蓉娇美，喻蜀王首植市花之功勋。看三星故垒，述古蜀文化之悠远。金沙遗址，颂故土先人之贤能。武侯古祠，出师文表，警世楹联，羽扇綸巾，趣品三国英雄纵论天下，运筹帷幄，提兵布阵。绿荫草堂，茅屋秋风，窗含西岭，景仰工部诗圣，不朽名篇，朗吟心口，幽思连绵，意切情真。
 拜玄奘唐僧当年之旧居；朝薛涛才女望江之碑亭；慕双眼井巴老之故宅；游青羊、文殊、昭觉、大慈等宫院庙寺，观王建古墓，明王十陵；上龙泉朱熹宗祠,读朱氏文化之典籍；登塔山九天高楼，俯览成都之全景风采,释怀天府之古今纵横。
 而追忆入蜀之名人俊杰:李冰、诸葛孔明，杜甫、陆游、元稹，贾岛、薛涛、寇准；出川之贤德圣人:苌弘、王褒、司马相如、卓文君，陈寿、李白、苏东坡、张大千、吴玉章、郭沫若、巴金；一代伟人邓小平。朱德、陈毅、刘伯承、聂荣瑧、杨尚昆、罗瑞卿， 。皆文武之全才,开国之元勋,堪称中华之擎天大柱, 川蜀之耀世精英……。夫,如斯难尽之佼佼者,足可见，自古贤圣多入蜀，川蜀江山出能人。蜀都之千古风流，故国之人杰地灵，致成都之历史人文，源远流长，丰富多彩，博大精深矣！
 一日,兴游蜀都,首览蓉城中隽。新建天府广场,满眼奇彩缤纷。太极图案,文化龙腾,太阳神鸟,黄龙叠池,尽皆出神入化,涵蕴丰盈。历史人文,动静山水,美妙绝伦之荟萃；古今蜀人,睿智宿愿,巧夺天工之缩影。跨过蜀都大道,即至春熙路上,起伏涌动思潮,仍无稍许平静，黄白黑肤,人头攒动,洋洋潇洒,笑语穿群。新老店铺,典籍市井,古蜀风雅,音容犹存。一条步行长街,述说故国工商之兴衰沉浮；三个街名大字，系连天府蜀人之情愫心灵。
 由此驱车出城，凭窗拭目，展望城东外景，好一派全新风光，惊喜连连，叫绝声声。层林尽染狮子山,烟波浩荡东湖镜，“四A景区"，“五朵金花”：“江家菜地，东篱菊园，荷塘月色，三圣花乡，幸福梅林。”朵朵万里飘香，处处千姿百态，繁荣似锦；世界瞩目，无不为之倾羡；中外首创，“乐”化农家新村。羡慕城市，离土打工，乡女愁嫁，俱往矣。老外、帅哥，欲娶村姑，也难使之点头应诺,轻动芳心。
 登临龙泉山麓，古镇客家文化，国际桃花盛会，岁岁人潮蜂拥，南洋欧美共鸣。君不见，龙泉之名山，水草丰润，竹茂林深；天然氧吧，连绵万顷，成都之绿肺，当之无愧也。而宏伟战略东移，浩阔国际新城；东山一朝起舞，锦城欢歌呼应。人道是：“蜀都之跨越发展，一路腾飞鹏程，真乃人心之所向，众望所归之因也”！
 而移步城南内外，此处风貌犹怡神。气派而典雅，多彩而文明。广厦靓街，古楼名苑，社区家园，别致新颖。“春江花月”一揽长街，餐饮娱乐，史遗人文，繁荣壮观，奇彩纷呈。泳场广场，球场马场，会展中心，高档宏阔，各显特色功能。“蜀江锦里”,锦花绣卉,千古不朽,中外驰名。忆“琴台”“浣花”多少事，赏“百花潭”中满园春。再联想，仅此南郊一隅之间，即可去到花水湾里温泉浴，烟霞湖上荡船艇；黄龙溪边垂钓乐，十八步岛释忧闷；牧马山下观赛事，安仁古镇赏展珍。盖乃，无论武侯、双流、大邑，新津、高新，一路激情观想，心潮奔涌，热血沸腾也！
 更那堪，双流机场，南郊一绝，不是风景，胜似风景。巍巍然，现代国际空港；赫赫然，西部最大航城。南来北往，不分高低贵贱；东旅西游，不论中外人等。随银鹰展翅高飞，鸟瞰回味,蜀都之旖旎风光,九州共享，跨市越省，弹指挥间，平安还归千家乐；伴空姐笑语温存，神忆流香，锦城之佳美人情,四海同游，腾云驾雾，眨眼晃时，兴致往返万里行。
 空游遐想未消，旋即转车西城。放眼眺望，青城仙山，突入视野。或问，何谓仙、幽之山？他日亲游，赋诗感念为证：“山上山下，无处不幽不圣；前山后山，无时不绿不青；里山外山，无人不仰不敬；……”。
 看青山绿水，走兽飞禽；道观古寺，史传秘经；騒客墨宝，诗书画楹；晨钟暮鼓，远幻近影。仙风道骨，禅意梵音；隐居彦士，民间高人；善男信女，中外佳宾。避暑纳凉，若鹜驱临；农家乐园，别洞天景；独有时鲜野菜，名特山珍；再兼练功悟道，修养心性，济张生命；天下无二可寻。
 观雾绕逶迤群峰，山戏缥缈烟云；探通天石阶斜道，幽深羊肠曲径；想清泉滴润心脾，彩瀑飞溅爽身；攀藤爬峭相视笑，悬崖躬行携伴紧；清风才住林涛，深涧又起鸟鸣。移步换景看不够，心旷神怡忘归程；诱煞诸君叹观止，年年重游难过瘾。青城奇幽赛仙山，偕与峨眉、剑阁，九寨、龙池，雪山 西岭。汇就川蜀之锦锈天地，华夏之绝世风景。
 如斯“天下第一名山，”又在都江水韵圣地，古城仙山，天地造化，风物通灵。孕长寿之城乡，兴灌溉之泽恩,皆得益于雪域之甘露,蜀人之德勤。自然、人文等，项项“ 世遗”冠美称。都江、青城，相得益彰共提振；旅游创最佳，百业竞峥嵘，更上青山高楼又一层。
 环眺西郊区县，花海树锦满城郭，今古奇观万象新。打造林荫径道，温江首当头领。城乡居民，骑游行走，信步闲庭；情趣悠然，休憩锻炼，大益身心。“国色天乡”主题乐园，欢声阵阵，人流滚滚。生机勃勃，日上蒸蒸。千古柳城翠，盛妆赛丹青；百年金温江，今朝遍地金；国际花园城，腾实又飞声。
 西延大道车如织，佳宾云集谋双赢。不独温江诱引之故，还因邛蒲崇彭，素有绝妙典藉，各领世代风骚，人称“川西四大明灯”。既有“丝绸之路"，“茶马古道”起始之地。又有“船棺汉墓”“龙门仙湖”“古镇传奇”之胜。还有“牡丹之乡”，早获大宋陆游盛赞，“堪与洛阳牡丹，各冠南北”之评。
 回览西城，醉赏名珺。故国遗风，含蕴深沉。“易园”闹中取幽静，名出《易经》玄机深。昔日，专供中外国宾独享；而今，百姓也可休闲品茗；....。爱不忍离城西境，无奈车催上北城。
 车至北郊,观想旧称之“銀郫县”，古今辉煌，远近光耀彪炳。“望丛”古国，领开都邑蜀史；“山歌之乡”，更令全球名响声震。
 转进熊猫家园 ，此处男女老幼,如常川流不停,珍稀国宝，人见人亲。一副乖巧憨态，笑煞中外游君。喜小小绒装宠娇,显神奇,不言无愧开心果，四面八方送福音；惊区区竹食生灵,出奥妙，无语不负天使衔，五洲四海传友情。
 继而浏览城北，步入新都、成华、青白江域，又出望外之喜惊。所到之处，“美声”高亢，捷报频频。山美、水美、天美、人美，美不胜收，美难言尽。碧湖、清潭、溪流、泉喷，映物生辉幻奇景。花园、丛林、绿带、草坪，如影随形步步跟。人和心齐，妙手回春造湿地；科学规划，城乡统筹集大成。草长莺飞，百花争妍，蜂蝶争吻。公园欢歌声声起，校园书声阵阵清；洗衣村姑河边笑,你追我问讨恋经；鱼跃塘河戏青波，鹤鸟放歌闹北门。此地今非昔日比，既有先声夺人之开创，又有后来居上之奋进。
 游罢蜀都之四邻，享尽眼福之余巡，再书饮食文化之念，以绪广众游客心愿，大饱口福之情兴。论川府之美食，道蜀都之餐饮。家喻户晓而众口赞称：品类之繁多，味道之鲜美，形色之绚丽，誉满天下，无与比伦。万类千宗，争相求特求精；新老品牌，一如雨后春笋：麻婆豆腐、赖汤元，常吃常品总鲜新；谭氏鱼头，棒棒鸡，辣得满汗还叫“整”；担担小面、龙抄手，男宠女爱老少欣；黄甲羊肉、緾丝兔，入口便知品味正；青城腊肉、梭边鱼；黑白花黄皆诱人；张飞牛肉、名川酒，故国情味儿慢慢品；张茶鸭子、乌巢汤，不腥不燥强身心；火锅、串串，“上上纤”，越吃越觉更来劲……。
 曾风闻一好奇之食客,觅食蜀都大街小巷,市场园林。但见得,这条“小吃巷,”那座“饮食城；”此也是灯红酒绿,家家美味佳肴；彼也是香飘气腾, 样样名特餐饮。直惊得此觅食之客“妈呀”一声禁不住,“真叫我心花意乱,吃啥好耶?这也脆香,那也鲜嫩。左边家，从未见过吃过,右边馆，更是闻所未闻。天啦!我纵是浑身长上千张嘴,也食之不完,尝之不尽矣!”君与之，亦叫您眼界大开,馋涎欲滴,必期有朝一日吃个够,享足一世口福,吃出潇洒人生。
 迷蜀都之千般吃喝，醉川酒之窖酿香醇。但使食客君勿忘：借坐锦江水榭廊亭之幽雅,受享蓉城园林花华之芳芬；一杯郁香川茶，品尽人生百味；一折精美川剧，赏够蜀韵千情。逛一趟最成都之宽窄名巷，好一似梦幻般之古幽远行。听一场李伯清之散打评书，总让你笑得前俯后仰，肚子生疼。蜀都之名特，多而广博，不乏深厚之底蕴。休闲生活，水土气候,温馨宜人。“来了不想走,走了还想来。”艺谋张君，肺腑之言，实乃千真万确，人皆共感，恰如其分也！
 遍游蓉城之上下里外，畅想蜀都之地贵天尊。不免因吾已花甲老朽，亦曾患过癌症，整日之劳顿而精神疲乏。是夜里，恍恍乎，迷迷乎，似睡非睡；一枕美梦又长做，奇景佳音现频频。 “成都方式”新花盛开，“幸福之城”和谐风生。地铁站网，遍布泱泱蜀都，五道环线，串绕座座城镇。 “森林城市”名至实归，国家认证；“城市森林"，别开生面，点线连荫。登高环望新蜀都,无边碧绿放彩屏.。
 再回首,龙泉山麓新起点。千古雄州，简阳回归当庆。新建特大机场，成都活力大增。“诸湖一山”，世界一流森林公园，指日可待告竣。金堂、简阳，乃至蜀都全民，下班可登东山游，一日万众上青云。
 盖喻曰：“蜀都恰似岷江水，一路欢歌向东进；成都更像航天神，高瞻远瞩赛雄鹰，比翼长空永飞升。”
 噫乎，未来之天府蜀都，堪为华夏之高天明星欤!
注：
 1、故人左思、扬雄等都曾撰《蜀都赋》。然，因年深日久，已与当下之蜀都山水地域，人文景观大不相同。而今人所写之《蜀都赋》又都太过“追深求古”，苦于难读难懂者，不在少数。故写此骈散新赋，以就教并方便大家。 2、此赋自2006年撰写之后，虽然，曾已缩写本获得2013年第二届中华魂全国辞赋赛，“赋王杯”优秀奖，但求做到，“ 十年苦作大赋，贵在精益求精。”为便利大家好读好记。力争情景交融，生动流畅，一韵到底，致无重韵之感，已历百十余次修改之多。故尔，其内容偶有多年时差痕迹，还请读君谅解。 3、五代蜀后主孟昶，在扩修成都之同时，又命遍植芙蓉花于全城，致为今日之市花更加功成名就，长史冠盖神州。
 4、位于成都东城蜀都大道的大慈寺，是为大唐时期玄奘高僧出使西域之前，就此研习、传播佛学的地方。
 5、为纪念唐代女诗人薛涛，后人在其生前所居之旁，成都望江公园里建有祭碑和祀亭。
 6、位于成都少城路双眼井之巴金故居地，至今仍有慕名而来者，以示怀念巴老。
 7、文中所写之“新建天府广场‘’标志性建筑，已因修地铁站而拆掉。人们正翘首以待，何时可以重建？
 8、东部龙泉山麓之洛带古镇，是明清时期几度湖广填四川之客家人聚居地。现已成为成都十大历史文化，旅游观光名镇之一。
 9、东郊新城龙泉国家级开发区，素以山水风景，观光农业驰名中外，其国际桃花节已历时40余届，吸引游客数过忆，引入投资逾百亿元。
 10、城西之金牛宾馆，原为省委、省政府招待所。毛泽东、金日城、西哈努克、布什、邓小平、江泽民等许多中外元首都曾下榻于此。该宾馆后花园，幽深静谧，典雅精致，身临其境，妙趣横生，实为世之稀有。 11、邛蒲崇彭，分别指邛崃、蒲江、崇州、彭州四个县、市。这里还是建国之初，震惊天下的“川西剿匪”红色文化的诞生地。 12、蜀都之开先，郫县等地史志，都有古望丛国“一年成市，三年成都，传九世而呈祥”之记。 13、厦门大学教授“百家讲坛”著名主讲人易中天把成都三圣乡誉为城乡统筹发展之典范，并撰文谓之“成都方式”。并致推广全国。
 14、天府雄州简阳，历史上就属成都管辖。近百年来，先后划归内江、资阳直管和代管。2016年5月16日经国务院批准，正式回归成都。这一重大决策，终于结束了简阳行政区划的长期扭曲状态。为简阳的更大更快发展，尤其为成都打造"国家中心城市"增添了无尽的活力与空间。

posts.text: تذکر هیئت نظارت بر مطبوعات به کیهان برای تیتر «شلیک موشک انصارالله به دوبی» روزنامه کیهان (در عکس مدیر مسئول آن حسین شریعتمداری) گفته کسانی که به این روزنامه تذکر دادهاند، حق «دم زدن از منافع ملی» را ندارند ارسال دبیر هیئت نظارت بر مطبوعات میگوید تیتر «شلیک موشک انصارالله به ریاض، هدف بعدی دوبی» در روزنامه کیهان، «خلاف امنیت ملی» تشخیص و به این روزنامه تذکر داده شدهاست. اما کیهان صبح سهشنبه همچنان در تیتر اول خود بر موضع پیشین پافشاری کردهاست. روابط عمومی معاونت مطبوعاتی وزارت فرهنگ و ارشاد اسلامی ایران به نقل از علاءالدین ظهوریان، دبیر هیئت نظارت بر مطبوعات، نقل کردهاست که مقرر شد به روزنامه کیهان بابت تیتر «شلیک موشک انصارالله به ریاض، هدف بعدی دوبی»، که خلاف مصالح و امنیت ملی تشخیص داده شد، تذکر داده شود. در نامه برای روزنامه کیهان تاکید شده این تذکر «نظر به حساسیت موضوع و وظیفه رسانهها در حراست و صیانت از منافع کشور، تذکر و تاکید هیئت محترم نظارت بر مطبوعات مبنی بر ضرورت رعایت مصالح کشور مطابق قوانین و مقررات» به مدیر مسئول آن اعلام میشود. مشخص نیست تاثیر این تذکر به روزنامهای که توسط نماینده رهبر جمهوری اسلامی اداره میشود، چه خواهد بود. این روزنامه خود در تیتر روز سهشنبه ۱۶ آبان آورده است که «مصالح ملی در حمایت از مظلومان یمن است نه نگرانی برای برجهای دوبی». کیهان صبح سهشنبه نوشته است «نکته مضحک ماجرا آنجاست که این جماعت که رسانههایشان مملو از تیترهای ضدامنیت و منافع ملی است، ناگهان دلواپس منافع ملی شدهاند». کیهان در پیوند با این بخش از اظهاراتش گفته «رسانههایی که رسما آمریکا را بزک» یا از برجام دفاع میکنند -به گفته این روزنامه- حق «دم زدن از منافع ملی» را ندارند. ریاض مسقیما ایران را به دست داشتن در پرتاب موشک از یمن متهم کرده و گفته این کار بهمعنی «اعلان جنگ» به عربستان است و این کشور نیز به آن واکنش نشان خواهد داد. وزیر خارجه عربستان سعودی نیز گفتهاست موشک پرتابشده از یمن «ایرانی» بود و «حزبالله لبنان از مناطقی در یمن که حوثیها تصرف کردهاند، پرتاب کرده است». پیشتر سخنگوی ائتلاف به رهبری عربستان در جمع خبرنگاران گفته بود حاملهای پرتاب موشک ساخت ایران بودند . شماری از مقامهای ارشد نظامی ایران اتهامهای وارد شده را «بیاساس» توصیف و رد کردهاند. وزارت خارجه ایران نیز گفته این اظهارات «ناروا، غیرمسئولانه و مخرب» است. اما تیتر روزنامه کیهان در مورد «هدف بعدی دوبی» نه تنها در رسانههای خارجی در پیوند با اتهامهای مطرحشده علیه جمهوری اسلامی مورد اشاره قرار گرفته، واکنشهایی را در رسانههای داخلی ایران نیز ایجاد کردهاست. روزنامه شرق، چاپ تهران، سهشنبه ۱۶ آبان ماه گفته است «به عقیده بسیاری، مطالب کیهان میتواند دردسرساز شود. آنها میگویند گزارش اصلی کیهان و مطلب طنز این روزنامه رسمی کشور میتواند مورد استناد عربستان و آمریکا برای ادعای ایفای نقش ایران در شلیک موشک به عربستان قرار گیرد». عبدالله رمضانزاده، سخنگوی دولت محمد خاتمی نیز در صفحه اينستاگرام خود نوشته بود: «محض رضای خدا و بهخاطر امنيت ملی يكی جلوی اين را بگيرد». روز دوشنبه، وزارت دفاع آمریکا از عربستان سعودی برای آنچه «فاش ساختن» نقش ایران در انتقال سامانههای موشکی برای شبهنظامیان حوثی در یمن توصیف میکند، تمجید کرد.
